body_html:
I am having the same problem on windows .I am getting the following error
c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspave\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_excutor\cuda\duda_driver.cc:94] check failed: s.ok() could not find cuDevicePrimaryCtxSetFlags in libcuda DSO; dlerror: cuDevicePrimaryCtxSetFlags not found

and python has stopped working whenever I run tf.Session,
Could you please help I am struggling with this problem
